name: OCI Container Utils
description: Installs useful CLI tools for working with OCI containers, namely skopeo and oras

orasVersion.description: Version of oras to install.  See https://oras.land/cli for details.  Omit for the default pinned version.

skopeoInstallSource.description: Locations to attempt to install skopeo from.  Choosing 'automatic' will attempt to install from apt first, then homebrew. Choosing 'none' will skip installation.
